pages.text:
About About Our Founders Anne and Dan Moon have always lived for their love of golf. So it was no surprise when they met on a golf course in Auburn, Alabama and fell in love with each other. Since that hot summer day in 2000, the couple has embraced their passion for the sport and turned it into their careers. Following Anne’s college golf career at Auburn University, she pursued the excitement of professional golfing. This eventually opened a door into the business world of golf and she was brought to Melbourne, Florida by Callaway Golf. Dan’s golf retail career began with Edwin Watts Golf and after many promotions and long distance moves, gave him the experience he needed to partner with his wife and purchase Golf USA here in Melbourne, Florida. The couple turned the store into Moon Golf in 2015 and have been providing customers with superior service and golf expertise ever since. Their passion for golf is such a huge part of their lives that they make it their job to share that passion and love with every customer that comes into Moon Golf. Are You CHIPPR? This is a question we ask each other throughout the day here at Moon Golf. We want to be sure we are giving every customer an EXCEPTIONAL experience here at Moon Golf. • World-Class C ustomer Service • H ard Work • I ntegrity • P assion • P ositive Attitude • R espect Why We Exist We love the game of golf and want to share that passion with others. We want our customers that come into the store to experience the same passion that each of our employees have for the game. We also want to ensure that every customer that comes in has a positive experience by being spoken to honestly, being treated with respect, and being greeted with a positive attitude. Our Mission is to share our passion and love for the game of golf by providing world-class customer service, expert knowledge, and always having the best selection of golf products in stock. Cell Phone Number * Δ Click here for sweepstakes rules and regulations. US Customers only. Automated text messages will be sent to the number supplied. Message and data rates may apply.

Contact MELBOURNE PHONE 321-752-0078 Vero Beach PHONE 772-770-2002 AUBURN PHONE 334-239-4300 Conversation starts here Contact us Today First Name * Last Name Email * Phone Preferred Location * Select Moon Golf Store Melbourne Vero Beach Auburn Message * CAPTCHA Email This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged. Δ FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS Do you sell used clubs? Yes, in the Melbourne location we do sell used golf equipment. Inventory is constantly changing and varies store to store. Please call the store ahead of time if you are looking for something in particular Do you accept trade-ins? Yes! We accept trades of name brand golf equipment and will give you a fair value based on our valuation guides. The trade in will be received in the form of store credit. Moon Golf does not offer cash for trades. How do I buy a gift card from you if I can’t get to a store? Currently we don’t sell gift cards online. However, you can contact the store directly to purchase a gift card over the phone. We can then either hold it for the recipient or mail it directly to you. Do you rent golf clubs? Unfortunately, we do not rent golf clubs at any of our locations Do you have golf instructors on site that give lessons? Yes, each store has certified and PGA golf instructors. Lessons are $50 for a half hour and include video and trackman analysis of your golf swing. Special packages may be available from the instructor. Please feel free to contact the store for more information Can I rent out a hitting bay to practice? Yes, you can rent Trackman time for $25 a half hour and $40 for the hour. This allows you to play virtual golf, practice using the trackman software, or work on your swing with video playback. Availability is limited, call the store to schedule. Do you have a corporate program with special pricing? Yes, we work with many companies to provide special pricing on logo Apparel, Golf balls, bags, etc. Please contact the store for more information. Can I hold a corporate event at Moon Golf? Yes, we have held corporate events, parties, and even birthday parties at Moon Golf. We can provide drinks and access to the hitting bays with caddies to assist your guests. Play virtual golf, have a long drive contest, or participate in a closest to the pin. Pricing varies, please contact us for more information.
